select * from wt_ResCata_Ref where
title like '%${tag}%'

select a.*, b.bcSource, b.flowURI from wt_Broadcast a left join wt_BCLiveFlow b on a.id=b.bcId and b.isMain=1 where
CONCAT(a.bcTitle, '#S#', a.bcPublisher) like '%${tag}%'
union select c.*, d.bcSource, d.flowURI from wt_Broadcast c left join wt_BCLiveFlow d on c.id=d.bcId and d.isMain=1 where c.id in (${inIds})

select a.*, b.smType, b.maSource, b.playURI from wt_MediaAsset a left join wt_MaSource b on a.id=b.maId and b.isMain=1 where
CONCAT(a.maTitle,'#S#',a.maPublisher,'#S#',a.subjectWord,'#S#',a.keyWord,'#S#',a.descn) like '%${tag}%'
union select c.*, d.smType, d.maSource, d.playURI from wt_MediaAsset c left join wt_MaSource d on c.id=d.maId and d.isMain=1 where c.id in (${inIds})

select a.*, case when b.count is null then 0 else b.count end as count from wt_SeqMediaAsset a left join (select sid, count(*) count from wt_SeqMA_Ref group by sid) b on a.id=b.sid
CONCAT(a.smaTitle,'#S#',a.smaPublisher,'#S#',a.subjectWord,'#S#',a.keyWord,'#S#',a.descn) like '%${tag}%'
union select c.*, case when d.count is null then 0 else d.count end as count from wt_SeqMediaAsset c left join (select sid, count(*) count from wt_SeqMA_Ref group by sid) d on c.id=d.sid where c.id in (${inIds})

select * from wt_MaPerson_Ref a, wt_Person b where a.personId=b.id
or (a.resType=1 and a.resId in (${bcIds})) or (a.resType=2 and a.resId in (${maIds})) or (a.resType=3 and a.resId in (${smaIds}))

select * from wt_ResCata_Ref
or (resType=1 and resId in (${bcIds})) or (resType=2 and resId in (${maIds})) or (resType=3 and resId in (${smaIds}))
select * from wt_SeqMediaAsset where id=#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select a.*, b.smType, b.maSource, b.playURI from wt_MediaAsset a left join wt_MaSource b on a.id=b.maId and b.isMain=1 join wt_SeqMA_Ref c on a.id=c.mId where c.sId=#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from wt_ResCata_Ref where resType=#{resType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and resId in (${ids})
